name: Flow (itch) (kyunru)
description:
Go...Stop...Go...Stop!!!

In Flow you have to move around and get to the portal.
The platforms around you only move while you stay in place and they are staying in place while you move around.
Collect the stars to open the portal, to get to another level.

Have fun!

Controls:

Move:                       Left/Right Arrow
Jump:                       Space
Pause:                      ESC or P

Team:
Programming:         Kyunru
Art:                          Kyunru
Level Design:         Kyunru
Sound:                     Kyunru (not implemented yet^^)

This is a one girl creation :)

It's sadly not the right Version uploaded :/

PS: If you want to play the right version, I uploaded it again here:
https://kyunru.itch.io/flowii
